content:
SecurityKeyUsage Enum

Definition

Specifies how a key that is associated with a security token can be used.

In this Article

public enum SecurityKeyUsage
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
SecurityKeyUsage

Remarks

Use the SecurityKeyUsage enumeration to set KeyUsage property.

Fields

Exchange

Specifies that the key can be used to exchange keys between a sender and a receiver.
Signature

Specifies that the key can be used to generate a digital signature.
